Hijacked Malta-flagged ship Ruen spotted near Somalia, security firm saysThe Maltese-flagged bulk cargo ship Ruen, which was hijacked by Somali pirates in December, was reported sailing off the coast of Somalia and may be used to conduct attacks on merchant vessels, British maritime security firm Ambrey said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 17:26:33 GMT NTLPJWRMRNOY7BTD6DHC2DY7AQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/hijacked-malta-flaged-ship-ruen-spotted-near-somalia-security-firm-says-2024-03-14/Reuters世界非洲
No evidence from Israel to back UNRWA accusations, says EU humanitarian chiefThe European Union's top humanitarian aid official said on Thursday he had seen no evidence from Israel to back its accusations against staff from the U.N. Palestinian refugee agency (UNRWA), which should continue playing a "critical" role in Gaza. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 17:20:59 GMT 77NVEVL3CRJUVJUCATK2TWIZNU https://www.reuters.com/world/no-evidence-israel-backs-unrwa-allegations-says-eu-人道主义-chief-2024-03-14/Nette Noestlinger, Gabriela Baczynska世界
Power blackout hits Venezuela's Paraguana refining center, sources sayA power blackout forced Venezuela's largest refining complex, the 955,000-barrel-per-day (bpd) Paraguana Refining Center, to shut down on Thursday, five sources close to its operations said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 17:12:10 GMT沃格鲁VRRMJPVHPH3TRXL2FUEWM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/power-blackout-hits-venezuela-paraguana-refining-center-sources-say-2024-03-14/Reuters世界美洲
Portugal election winner seeks to sidestep far-right with spendingPortugal's rightist Democratic Alliance (AD), which won Sunday's election by a slim margin, hopes that its proposed tax cuts and wage hikes will be impossible for the far-right Chega party to reject, allowing it to govern without any deals with the populists. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 17:11:49 GMT BNTVZX7TTNLY7N6PLHXIFH6RHI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/portugal-election-winner-seeks-sidestep-father-right-with-spending-2024-03-14/Sergio Goncalves, Catarina Demony世界欧洲
Britain tightens Turks and Caicos security after Haiti violenceBritain said on Thursday it had agreed a security package to protect the borders of the Turks and Caicos Islands - a British Overseas Territory - in response to the risk violence in Haiti could spread. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 16:56:30 GMT TY5BBOEAURJLZG6OVFG2DQUR4E https://www.reuters.com/world/britain-tightens-turks-caicos-security-after-haiti-violence-2024-03-14/Reuters世界
US envoy warns over Hungary's 'close and expanding' links with RussiaNATO allies are warning Hungary of the dangers of its "close and expanding" relationship with Russia and if this is Budapest's policy choice "we will have to decide how best to protect our security interests", the U.S. envoy to Hungary said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 16:51:35 GMT M5U3GL3DBRKG5N7X6OHDGM332Q https://www.reuters.com/world/us-envoy-warns-over-hungary-close-expanding-links-with-Russia-2024-03-14/Reuters世界
Egypt calls on Israel to open land crossings for Gaza aidEgypt's foreign minister called on Israel on Thursday to open its land crossings to let more aid into the Gaza Strip and said Egypt was continuing efforts to agree a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas and a hostage-prisoner exchange. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 16:33:34 GMT P4JHRQHQMRPPFETQJLUBJBZRBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/egypt-calls-israel-open-land-crossings-gaza-aid-2024-03-14/Reuters世界中东地区
Jamaican dancehall star Vybz Kartel wins appeal over murder convictionJamaican dancehall star Vybz Kartel's conviction for the murder of an associate more than a decade ago was quashed on Thursday, with a London court ruling that attempts to bribe the trial jury meant the conviction was unsafe. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 16:25:31 GMT 7YLEOI7HFNKVHJUPYTOUWLNQKM https://www.reuters.com/world/jamaican-dancehall-star-vybz-cartel-wins-appeal-over-murder-conviction-2024-03-14/Reuters世界
Dutch parties resume coalition talks after Wilders forgoes PM roleThe four Dutch political parties most likely to form a government will resume negotiations on a looser coalition after far-right leader Geert Wilders', who won the election four months ago, acknowledged he lacked the support to take the top job. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 16:14:07 GMT VE6OQBKWBBLS7KEC3ZNC2KQCCI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-parties-resume-coalition-talks-after-wilders-forgoes-pm-role-2024-03-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Zimbabwe sect leader held after 251 children rescued from farm labourA Zimbabwean sect leader and "self-styled prophet" appeared in court on Thursday charged with child abuse after police raided his farm and rescued more than 200 children doing physical labour, police said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:48:55 GMT KVO5QHQKFNKHHC7B2CNLPPD26E https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/zimbabwe-sect-leader-success-after-251-children-rescued-farm-labour-2024-03-14/Nyasha Chingono世界非洲
Uprooted by war, Lebanese yearn for home at RamadanFor families who fled Israeli bombardment of southern Lebanon, being away from home is especially hard in the Islamic fasting month of Ramadan - a time when they usually enjoy special meals together but this year are scattered by conflict. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:38:24 GMT XJMAHXJLPJKNHLRK7FTRAPUQY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uprooted-by-war-lebanese-year-home-ramadan-2024-03-14/Aziz Taher, Ahmad Kerdi世界中东地区
